Cybersecurity Analyst

Company: delaPlex
Location: Nagpur, Maharashtra, India
LinkedIn post
Position: Cybersecurity Analyst

Experience: 0-2 Years

Location: Nagpur, India

Certification Required: OSCP, Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH)

Mandatory Skills: Penetration Testing, Ethical Hacking, OSCP, Tryhackme

About Delaplex

Delaplex is a leading technology solutions provider, committed to delivering innovative and secure IT services to our clients. We are looking for a motivated and skilled Cybersecurity Analyst to join our team in Nagpur.

Job Summary

As a Cybersecurity Analyst at Delaplex, you will play a crucial role in safeguarding our organization's information systems by identifying, analyzing, and mitigating security threats. This role is ideal for individuals who are passionate about cybersecurity and have a foundational understanding of ethical hacking principles.

Key Responsibilities

  • Security Monitoring: Continuously monitor network traffic and system activities for potential security threats and anomalies.
  • Threat Analysis: Analyze security incidents to determine their impact and develop strategies to prevent future occurrences.
  • Vulnerability Management: Conduct regular vulnerability assessments and penetration testing to identify and address security weaknesses.
  • Incident Response: Assist in the investigation and response to security incidents, including root cause analysis and remediation.
  • Security Audits: Participate in internal and external security audits to ensure compliance with security policies, standards, and regulations.
  • Documentation: Maintain detailed records of security incidents, vulnerabilities, and remediation efforts.
  • Security Awareness: Assist in developing and delivering security awareness training for employees to promote a culture of security.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with IT and development teams to implement security best practices and ensure the security of applications and systems.

Required Qualifications

  • Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Cybersecurity, or a related field.
  • Certification: Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH) certification is mandatory.
  • Experience: 0-2 years of experience in cybersecurity or a related field.
  • Technical Skills:
  • Basic understanding of network protocols, firewalls, and security technologies.
  • Familiarity with common cybersecurity tools and software.
  • Knowledge of operating systems (Windows, Linux) and their security features.
  • Soft Skills:
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
  • Attention to detail and a proactive approach to security.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience with security information and event management (SIEM) tools.
  • Knowledge of scripting languages (e.g., Python, Bash) for automation of security tasks.
  • Understanding of regulatory compliance standards (e.g., GDPR, ISO 27001).

What We Offer

  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Opportunities for professional growth and development.
  • A collaborative and inclusive work environment.
  • Access to the latest cybersecurity tools and technologies.
